Monitor.​ViewApp.​ViewModel.​LogViewModel
ViewModelBase
public
Monitor.​ViewApp.​ViewModel.​LogViewModel

LogViewModel class stores the logic & data of the LogView.  The main goal of the LogViewModel is to link between the messages list to the UI components.  This class inherits from Galasoft.MvvmLight.ViewModelBase which is the base class for any ViewModel in MVVM pattern.

private readonly DataState m_dataState
